languages.text: {n}Ульфар, насупившись, мечет в вас грозный взгляд, но затем, не выдержав, хохочет.{/n} "Что правда, то правда. У родившихся на Фенрисе через слово волк".

{n}Ulfar shoots you a menacing look from under his brows, but then, unable to restrain himself, bursts out laughing.{/n} "You are not wrong there! Every other word out of a Fenrisian's mouth is 'wolf.'"
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар, насупившись, мечет в вас грозный взгляд, но затем, не выдержав, хохочет.{/n} "Что правда, то правда. У родившихся на Фенрисе через слово волк".

languages.text: {n}乌尔法皱着眉，朝你投来了威胁的目光，但随后他便克制不住自己，哈哈大笑起来。{/n}“你说得没错！芬里斯人嘴里说出的每一个字，都是‘狼’。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shoots you a menacing look from under his brows, but then, unable to restrain himself, bursts out laughing.{/n} "You are not wrong there! Every other word out of a Fenrisian's mouth is 'wolf.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法皱着眉，朝你投来了威胁的目光，但随后他便克制不住自己，哈哈大笑起来。{/n}“你说得没错！芬里斯人嘴里说出的每一个字，都是‘狼’。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar te lanza una mirada amenazadora, pero no logra contenerse y echa a reír.{/n} «¡No le falta razón! Una de cada dos palabras que se pronuncian en Fenris es "lobo"».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shoots you a menacing look from under his brows, but then, unable to restrain himself, bursts out laughing.{/n} "You are not wrong there! Every other word out of a Fenrisian's mouth is 'wolf.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar te lanza una mirada amenazadora, pero no logra contenerse y echa a reír.{/n} «¡No le falta razón! Una de cada dos palabras que se pronuncian en Fenris es "lobo"».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは眉の下から威嚇的な視線を送るが、抑えきれず笑い出した。{/n}「それは確かにそうだ！フェンリスの民の口から出る言葉はすべて『狼』だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shoots you a menacing look from under his brows, but then, unable to restrain himself, bursts out laughing.{/n} "You are not wrong there! Every other word out of a Fenrisian's mouth is 'wolf.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは眉の下から威嚇的な視線を送るが、抑えきれず笑い出した。{/n}「それは確かにそうだ！フェンリスの民の口から出る言葉はすべて『狼』だ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar wirft dir von unter seinen Brauen einen drohenden Blick zu, doch dann kann er sich nicht länger zurückhalten und lacht laut auf.{/n} "Da habt Ihr nicht ganz unrecht! Jedes Zweite Wort aus dem Mund eines Fenrisianers ist 'Wolf'."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shoots you a menacing look from under his brows, but then, unable to restrain himself, bursts out laughing.{/n} "You are not wrong there! Every other word out of a Fenrisian's mouth is 'wolf.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar wirft dir von unter seinen Brauen einen drohenden Blick zu, doch dann kann er sich nicht länger zurückhalten und lacht laut auf.{/n} "Da habt Ihr nicht ganz unrecht! Jedes Zweite Wort aus dem Mund eines Fenrisianers ist 'Wolf'."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar vous décoche un regard menaçant, les sourcils froncés, mais l'instant d'après, incapable de se retenir, il éclate de rire.{/n} « Il y a du vrai, là-dedans ! Chez nous, on cuisine le loup à toutes les sauces ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shoots you a menacing look from under his brows, but then, unable to restrain himself, bursts out laughing.{/n} "You are not wrong there! Every other word out of a Fenrisian's mouth is 'wolf.'"

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shoots you a menacing look from under his brows, but then, unable to restrain himself, bursts out laughing.{/n} "You are not wrong there! Every other word out of a Fenrisian's mouth is 'wolf.'"

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, kaşlarını çatarak sana tehditkâr bir bakış atıyor ama sonrasında kendini tutamayıp gülüyor.{/n} "Haklısın! Bir Fenrislinin ağzından çıkan iki laftan biri 'kurt'tur."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shoots you a menacing look from under his brows, but then, unable to restrain himself, bursts out laughing.{/n} "You are not wrong there! Every other word out of a Fenrisian's mouth is 'wolf.'"
